website_summaries.verdict: A super affordable way to take cod liver oil, but doesn't have the same benefits as more expensive brands.
pros: The soft gels are small and easy to take with no fishy aftertaste
Contains 45 milligrams of EPA and 60 milligrams of DHA omega-3
cons: Contains added synthetic vitamins and not as much omega-3 as other brands

customer_reviews.title: Product picture says 1000 IU Vitamin A! (From Cod ...
customer_reviews.text: Product picture says 1000 IU Vitamin A !(From Cod Liver Oil)! Actual product contains 500 IU (From Retynil Palmitate and Cod liver Oil). Since Vitamin A is one of the main component of Cod Liver Oil reducing it twice and introducing synthetic version without updating information is a sign of unreputable and low standard company
customer_reviews.author: N.T.

customer_reviews.title: The Vitamin A content is not from 100% Cod Liver ...
customer_reviews.text: The Vitamin A content is not from 100% Cod Liver oil as shown, its actually partial Retinyl Palmitate. I was trying really hard to get Natural Vitamins and of course the product pictures and info has not been updated to include the synthetic vitamin that is not from cod liver oil. Dissapointed because Im trying to use non synthetic products in my health plan and it is difficult to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Vincent Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: No burp fish pills
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these every day . My skin suffers from perioral dermititis and I believe the cod liver oil is helping clear my skin. Also big plus I havent had any burping up fish. So that's a big plus. Easy to swallow. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Eustace Daniyan

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestion and eye dryness.
customer_reviews.text: I've taken cod liver oil for many years for digestive reasons. A family member was also prescribed it for eye dryness. It seems to work for both issues, and I don't have to taste the fishy flavor with these capsules. Works well for my family.
customer_reviews.author: U Dont Know Me

customer_reviews.title: Greattttt!
customer_reviews.text: Okay at first I didn’t know if it would work but it has helped me so much with my mood swings and attitude I know it sound weird but if you have this problem just try them & see!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase of this NOW extra strength Cod Liver Oil tablets. I received it in a timely manner, well packaged and a super 2022 expiry date. Very satisfied. I will certainly recommend and purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Taste and looks just like cod liver oil. Trusted brand and great price...
customer_reviews.author: Abby castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No fishy aftertaste issues. Good value compared to smaller bottles of this product. Pill size is larger if that’s an issue for you that’s something to keep in mind. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Scully

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use this cod liver oil to give milky extra nutrition. Sometimes I won’t give milky food containing fish. Therefore I need cod liver oil in this circumstance. It works for milky and price is really affordable! I could also eat this supplements to give myself extra strength. Overall, this cod liver oil is valuable!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Li

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver pills better than liquid
customer_reviews.text: These pills are better than the liquid of which I hate the taste of. The pills were just as effective as the liquid. I'd definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: G.Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good product without all the fillers.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your good product. It was sent timely and we are getting great use out of all the benefits of good cod liver oil.
customer_reviews.author: findingmyway

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD. NOT THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Not bad however going back with my other brand Carlsons due to fact it includes each amount of EPA as well as DHEA
customer_reviews.author: Robert Venable

customer_reviews.title: Slides down
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, a big pill, but smooth and slides right down. No smell. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Help my joints
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these pills because a friend told me that someone had recommended it for his arthritis in the hip. I am not sure, but ever since I have been using them I noticed that I am able to stand more easily especially when I need to get up from a low toilet seat. I remember my grandma giving it to us as kids which also influenced me in purchasing it. The pills are large, but I found it not too bad to swallow, and I am a person that gags even with small aspirin swallowing. They are gel like and soft when swallowing with liquid. I will continue to take them.
customer_reviews.author: thick madame

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cod Liver Oil capsules came promptly and are a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver oil pills
customer_reviews.text: These cod liver oil pills size are similar to the regular fish oil pills. I thought they would be smaller. They do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: His recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Cod liver oil is a good omega 3 fatty acid.

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Don't have much to say other than it was delivered rather quickly in good packaging. The product itself I can not really tell a difference yet but that is normal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: For the Greatest Skin and Lower Cholesterol in Blood
customer_reviews.text: Totally great for lowering cholesterol and smaller size goes down easier! No after belching fishy taste for me!

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: It was highly recommended to me as the best for the immune system. I am taking it daily. Will see...

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking cod liver oils for a very long time and these help me so much with my skin and hair and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Squires

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be the best form of fish oil, according to what I've read in online nutrition sites. My husband's doctor prescribed expensive fish oil for my husband's elevated cholesterol. He had no idea it would cost $780.00 at Walgreens; said this fish oil would be just fine. His overall and LDL levels have gone down, but whether it's the fish oil or exercise/weight loss/lower carb diet, I couldn't say.
customer_reviews.author: CindyTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, take it in combination with the statin. Easy on my stomach.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product ---nice to take only one cap per day
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: ... most of my life and this is a very good product. Have used this brand for a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Have taken Cod Liver Oil most of my life and this is a very good product. Have used this brand for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: H. Roeder

customer_reviews.title: EPA DHA ratio not great, but it's affordable
customer_reviews.text: DHA content is higher than EPA content and this shouldn't be the case. We need more EPA. I will be looking for another affordable brand that has more EPA than DHA, but for now, this is affordable and I'll finish it
customer_reviews.author: Jabo

customer_reviews.title: I was told by my doctor to start taking vitamin A
customer_reviews.text: I use to have cod live oil as a child everyday of my life till my 20. Now i"m 73 and was told by my doctor to start taking vitamin A. Since I have my skin has improved and wish I knew this sooner. Pills are large but easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver oil
customer_reviews.text: Was given this as a child and now I'm taking it again. It is good for my body and for my heart. I love the quality this company offers me along with the price that I can afford. They have fast shipment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good brand vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Nice vitamin. Easy to swallow and n after taste/indigestion. Recommend

customer_reviews.title: Cod liver capsules
customer_reviews.text: This product has no flavor, so it makes it easy to take with no after taste!

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: So I guess I should read the dosage. This is the 1000 mg not the 650 mg, so the pills are enormous.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff...
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder. Good stuff, better than the other brands I've tried...

customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Will write a review in a few weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far So good. Will order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. The NOW Brand is my favorite brand to use. I now have a place that has the brand I love in Cod Liver Oil Supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: If labeling is accurate product is great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly capsules are uniform and not stuck together. There is no odor or aftertaste. As to actual quality or content how could one possibly know? We are totally dependent on labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

product_meta.title: NOW Supplements, Cod Liver Oil, Extra Strength 1,000 mg with Vitamins A & D-3, EPA, DHA, 180 Softgels
product_meta.description: Cod Liver Oil abounds in omega-3 fatty acids, EPA (eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid). It is also an excellent source of vitamins A and D-3. Cod liver oil has a long history of traditional use for the support of overall health and well-being.* The natural cod liver oil used in this softgel is manufactured under strict quality control standards. It is tested to be free of potentially harmful levels of contaminants such as PCBs, dioxins, mercury and other heavy metals. This extra strength product has more cod liver oil (1,000 mg per softgel) than our cod liver oil 650 mg softgel product.
feature_bullets: EXTRA STRENGTH: An excellent source of vitamins A and D-3! Cod liver oil has a long history of traditional use for the support of overall health and well-being.*
CARDIOVASCULAR SUPPORT*: The natural cod liver oil used in this softgel is manufactured under strict quality control standards.
CLASSIFICATIONS/CERTIFICATIONS: Soy Free, Kosher Contains Gelatin, Keto Friendly, Halal

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968.
